title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-5.7 - Final decisions on applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-5.7 - Final decisions on applications

State Regulations

The commission shall mail to the applicant, and to the
applicant's attorney, if known, a decision in the form of a permit, a permit
with conditions or, if applicable, a statement that the permit applied for has
been denied, with an explanation for the denial. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-5.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
